Translations.Text: Az ci ciz (kofironi Qurajs) hamdigarro mepursand
Az on xaʙari ʙuzurge suol mekunand
ki dar on ixtilof dorand va on Qur'on ast, ki xaʙar medihad az ruzi ʙa's, (ki kofironi Qurajs ʙa on imon najovarda ʙudand)
Ore, musrikon ʙa zudi xohand donist, (ki Alloh ʙa saʙaʙi ʙovar nadostanason ʙa ruzi qijomat, esonro ci xohad kard)

(Boz ham, ta'kid menamojad:) Ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist! (In ta'kid ʙaroi rost va haqiqat ʙudani pajomʙarii Rasuli Alloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam dalolat menamojad va on ci ki u, az Qur'on va az ruzi zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidan ovardaast.) (Dar in ojat va'id va tahdide ast ʙaroi ahli kuffor)
Ojo Mo zaminrro ʙistare nasoxtem
Va kuhhoro mexhoe nanamudaem, to zamin ustuvor istad
Va sumoro cuft-cuft (mardu zan) ofaridem
Va xoʙatonro mojai oromis qaror dodem, to ʙadanhojaton rohat kunad
Va saʙro pusisaton qaror dodem, ki ʙo torikias sumoro faro megirad, cunon ki dar ʙar dorandai liʙosro mepusonad
Va ruzro vaqti talosi ma'os (kasʙ) qaror dodem, to ʙaroi oʙodii hajoti xud sa'ju kusis namoed
Va ʙar ʙoloi saraton haft osmoni ustuvor ʙino kardem, ki dar on sikofi va nuqson nest
Va xursedro caroƣi ravsane ofaridem
Az aʙrhoi ʙoronafson oʙi farovone nozil kardem
to ʙo vasilai on donavu naʙotot ʙirujonem ʙaroi mardumon va hajvonot
va ʙa vasilai on niz ʙustonhoi darhampecidaro ato farmoem
Begumon ruzi dovari (qijomat,) ruzest mu'ajjan, ʙaroi avvalinu oxirin
Ruze, ki dar sur damida savad va sumo ongoh guruh-guruh meoed. (Ja'ne, hamai ummat ʙo hamrohi pesvojonason meojand)
Osmon sikofta savad va har suroxi dare ʙosad, to faristagon az on darvozaho furud ojand
Va kuhho, ʙa'di ustuvor ʙudan ravon soxta savand va cun saroʙe nestu noʙud gardand
Begumon cahannam kamingohest, dar intizori kofiron va ʙaroi onho omoda sudaast
va ʙaroi sarkason ʙozgastgohest
Zamonhoi daroz dar on co aʙadi ʙosand
Dar on co na havoi xunuki mecasandu na nusidanihoi forame menusand
faqat oʙi cusonu xunu cirk nusand
In cazoest muvofiqi kirdorason, ki dar in dunjo cunin amal karda ʙudand
Begumon, ki onon ʙa ruzi hisoʙ umed nadostand va nametarsidand
Va ojoti Moro ʙa kulli duruƣ mesumurdand va ʙa on ci Rasuli Alloh (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ovarda ʙud, onro tasdiq nadostand
Va hama cizro donistaem va dar, kitoʙe saʙt kardaem
Pas ta'mi talxii azoʙro ʙicased, ej kofiron, ki dar haqqi sumo cuz azoʙe naxohem afzud
Alʙatta parhezgoronro komjoʙii ʙuzurgest, onon kasoneand, ki az Parvardigori xes metarsand va amali soista mekunand va ʙa doxil sudani cannat komjoʙ mesavand
va ʙarojason niz ʙustonhovu daraxtoni angur
va duxtaroni navcavone hamsinnu sol
va comhoi pur az saroʙ
Va onho dar on co na suxani ʙehuda mesunavand va na duruƣ
va in mukofotest az sui Parvardigorat, podos va ʙaxsise az rui hisoʙ
Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. On Allohi Rahmon, dar dunjovu oxirat, ki az hajʙati U suxan gufta natavonand

ruze, ki Caʙrail va faristagon ʙa saf meistand va kase suxan namegujad, magar kase ki Allohi Mehruʙon ʙa u ruxsat dihad, va u suxani durust gujad. Va hec kasro safo'at karda nametavonand, magar ʙa icozati Allohi Mehruʙon
On ruz, ruzi haq ast. Dar omadani on ruz hec sakke nest. Pas har kase ʙixohad, nacot joftanro az azoʙ, rohi ʙozgaste ʙa sui Parvardigori xud ʙigirad ʙo amalhoi soleh

Mo sumoro az azoʙi ruzi qijomat, ki nazdikast, ʙim dodem: ruze, ki odami har ciro pesopes firistodaast, az amali nek jo ʙad, meʙinad va kofir az saxtii hisoʙ megujad: Ej kos, man xok meʙudam va ʙoz zinda namesudam
Alloh savgand jod mekunad ʙa faristagone, ki conhoi kofironro ʙa saxti megirand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki conhoi mu'minonro ʙa osoni megirand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki ʙaroi rasonidani farmoni Alloh sinokunon va sitoʙon az osmon furud meojand
va savgand, ʙa faristagone, ki ʙar jakdigar saʙqat mekunand dar icro namudani amrhoi Parvardigor
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki hamai korhoro tadʙir mekunand
ki on ruz, ki naxustin nafxai qijomat, ki nafxai mironidan ast, zaminro ʙilarzonad
va nafxai duvvum az pasi on ʙijojad, mardum az nav zinda xohand sud
Dar on ruz dilhoi kofiron az saxtii tars dar larza ʙosand
va azoʙu dahsathoi ruzi qijomatro musohida kunand, ʙar casmonason xori va furuaftodagi namojon savad
Munkironi ruzi az nav zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidan megujand: Ojo mo ʙa holati naxustin ʙozmegardem
on goh ki ustuxonhoe pusida ʙudem
Gujand: In ʙozgasti mo ʙozgastest zijonovar
Pas tanho jak ovozi ʙaland ast
va ongoh onon dar zamini hamvor (sahroi qijomat) meojand
Ej Pajomʙar, ojo qissai Muso (alajhis salom) ʙa tu rasidaast
On goh ki Parvardigoras uro dar vodii muqaddasi Tuvo sado kard
Ba sui Fir'avn ʙirav, ki u dar gunoh az had guzastaast
Bigu: Ojo turo raƣʙate hast, ki pokiza savi va ʙa imon nafsi xudro orosta kuni
va man turo ʙa sui Parvardigorat roh ʙinamojam va to tu ʙitarsi az U
Pas, Muso ʙa Fir'avn on mu'cizai ʙuzurg; aso va dastro nison dod
Va Fir'avn pajomʙari Alloh Muso (alajhissalom)-ro duruƣ ʙarovardu nofarmoni kard
Sipas pust gardond az imon va ʙar ziddi Muso sa'j va talos mekard
Pas hama ahli mamlakatasro cam' kard va nido dod
va Guft: Man Parvardigori ʙuzurgi sumo hastam
Pas Parvardigoras uro ʙa azoʙi oxiratu dunjo giriftor kard
Begumon dar in kirdori Fir'avn va on azoʙe, ki ʙar vaj nozil sud, pandi ʙuzurgest ʙaroi kase, ki az Alloh metarsad
Ej odamon, ojo ofarinisi sumo saxttar ast jo ofarinisi osmone ki Alloh onro soxtaast
Balandii onro ʙarafrost va onro ustuvor kard
saʙasro torik kard ʙa furu raftani oftoʙ va ruzasro ravsan kard ʙa ʙaromadani oftoʙ
va ʙa'd az xalqi osmon zaminro pahn kard
va az on oʙ ʙerun ovard va carogohho padid ovard
va kuhhoro ustuvor soxt
ʙaroi foidai sumo va corpojonaton. Az nav zinda gardonidani sumo ruzi qijomat dar nazdi Alloh osontarast az ofarinisi in cizho
Cun on hodisai ʙuzurgi qijomat darrasad
ruze, ki odami hamai amalhoi xudro az neku ʙad ʙa jod ovarad
va duzax ʙaroi har fardi ʙino oskor va namojon megardad
Pas har ki az had guzasta ʙosad dar kufru isjon
va zindagii incahonro ʙar zindagii oxirat ixtijor karda ʙosad
ʙegumon cahannam cojgohi ust
Ammo har kas, ki az istodan dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras tarsida ʙosad va nafsi xudro az havo va havas ʙozdosta ʙosad
pas ʙegumon ʙihist cojgohi ust
Ej Pajomʙar, turo musrikon tamasxuromezona az qijomat mepursand, ki ci vaqt voqe' savad
Az voqe' sudani on turo ci xaʙarest
Balki, ogohi az zamoni ʙarpo savii qijomat ʙa Parvardigorat ast
Tu tanho ʙimdihandai kase hasti, ki az qijomat metarsad
Ruze, ki onro ʙuʙinand, az havli qijomat pindorand dar in cahon faqat jak somgoh jo costgoh istodaand
Rasululloh (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) rujro turs kard va ruj ʙargardonid
cun on noʙino; Aʙdullo iʙni Maktum ʙa nazdas omad, dar on vaqt Rasululloh (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ʙa da'vati ʙuzurgoni Qurajs masƣul ʙud
Va tu ej Pajomʙar ci doni, sojad, ki on mardi noʙino pokiza savad
jo pand girad va pandi tu foidaas kunad
Ammo on ki u tavongar ast, ʙo mol va ʙa imon ehtijoc nadorad
tu rui xud ʙa u mekuni va ʙa kalomi vaj gus medihi
va agar ham pok nagardad, cize ʙar zijoni tu nest
Va ammo on, kase ki sitoʙon ʙa nazdi tu omad
va u az kamʙudi kardan dar rohi haq az Alloh metarsad
vale tu az u ruj metoʙi, ʙa digare ruj meori, amri Alloh cunin nest, magar in ki ʙajni ʙuzurgu notavon, ʙoju kamʙaƣal, mardu zan ʙaroʙar ʙosi
Ore, in ojathoi Qur'on pandest
pas har ki xohad, az on pand girad
Ojathoi Qur'on dar sahifahoe garonqadr ast
sahifahoe, ki pok va doroi manzalati ʙaland
ʙa dasti kotiʙoni
ʙuzurgvoru nekukor saʙt sudaast
La'nat va azoʙ ʙod ʙar insoni kofir, ki ci nosipos (nosukr) ast
Alloh uro avvalin ʙor az ci ofaridaast
Az nutfae ofaridast va ongoh uro ʙa andozae soxtaast
sipas rohasro oson soxt va ʙarojas rohi neku ʙadro ʙajon kard
Ba'd uro memironad va voridi guras megardonad
Sipas har vaqte ki xohad, uro ʙaroi hisoʙu kitoʙ zinda megardonad
Hargiz cunin maʙod! On ciro, ki ʙa u farmuda ʙud, ancom nadod
Pas odami ʙa ta'omi xud ʙingarad, ki ci guna Alloh ta'omi uro ʙaroi nigoh dostani hajotas ofarid
Mo ʙoronro ʙa farovoni furu rextem
sipas zaminro ʙa neki sikoftem
ongoh dar on donaho rujonidem
va anguru saʙzavot
va zajtunu daraxtoni xurmo
va ʙoƣhoi purdaraxtu anʙuh
va mevavu alafro
to sumovu corpojonaton ʙahra ʙared
Pas hangome ki on ʙongi guskarkunanda ruzi qijomat, ki gushoro kar mesozad, darrasad
ruze, ki odami az havli on ruz az ʙarodaras ʙigurezad
va az modaru padaras
va az hamsaru farzandonas
Har kasero az onon dar on ruzi qijomat kore hast, ki uro ʙa xud masƣul medorad
Dar on ruz cehrahoe sod va duraxsonand
xandonandu sodonand
Va cehrahoi duzaxijon dar on ruz ƣuʙoroludand
toriki onhoro furu mepusonad
Inho kofironand, ki ʙa ne'mathoi Alloh kufr ovardand va ojothoi Uro duruƣ ʙarovardand va ʙadkoronand, ki ʙa mahorimi Alloh cur'at kardand
Cun oftoʙ dar ham pecida savad va nuras xira savad
va cun sitoragon tira savand
va cun kuhho az coi xud ʙeco ʙisavand va pora-pora savand
va cun suturoni homila ʙa holi xud ʙesohiʙ guzosta savand
va cun convaroni vahsi cam' ovarda savand
va cun darjoho otas girand
va cun ruhho ʙo casadho nazdik savand va cam' ojand
va cun az duxtari zinda ʙa gur suda pursida savad, ki
ʙa ci gunohe kusta sudaast
va cun sahifahoi a'mol ʙoz savand
va cun osmon az coi xud kanda savad
va cun cahannam afruxta su'lavar gardad
va cun ʙihist nazdik ovarda savad
har kas ʙidonad, ki ci omoda kardaast, az xuʙi va ʙadiho
Alloh savgand jod mekunad ʙa sitoragoni ʙozgardanda, ki dar ruz pinhon mesavand
sitoragoni sajrkunandai ƣoiʙsavanda
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun torik savad
va savgand ʙa suʙh, cun ʙidamad
ki in Qur'on suxani rasuli ʙuzurgvor Caʙrail (alajhissalom) ast
U nerumand ast, dar nazdi Allohi Ars, doroi maqomi ʙolost
on co dar nazdi Alloh farmonʙardorsuda, ʙovarinok ast
Va hamsuhʙati sumo Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) devona nest
Ba durusti, u Caʙrailro ʙa surati haqiqaas dar ufuqi ravsan didaast
Va on ciro az ƣajʙ ʙa u gujand, dareƣ namedorad
Va on (Qur'on) guftai sajtoni rondasuda nest, ʙalki suxan va vahji Ilohi ast
Pas ʙa kuco meraved ʙa'di in qadar huccathoi qote'
In kitoʙ, pandest ʙaroi cahonijon
ʙaroi har kas az sumo, ki ʙixohad rostkirdor savad
Va sumo rosti va istiqomatro namexohed va ʙar in xost qodir ham nameʙosed, magar on ciro, ki Parvardigori cahonijon ʙixohad
On goh, ki osmon sikofta megardad va nizomi on vajron mesavad
va on goh ki sitoragon furu merezand
va on goh, ki darjoho ʙa siddat ravon mesavand
va on goh, ki qaʙrho zer va ru megardand
har kas, ki ci ciz pesopes firistoda va ci ciz ʙozpas guzostaast, xohad donist
Ej odami, ci ciz turo nisʙat ʙa Parvardigori karimat maƣrur soxtaast
On ki turo ʙijofarid va a'zojat durust kard, sipas ofarinisi turo mu'tadil gardond
Va ʙa har sakle, ki xost, turo tarkiʙ kard
Hargiz cunin nest, ki megued, ʙalki omadani qijomatro duruƣ mesumored
Va ʙegumon ʙar sumo muhofizone (faristagone) voʙasta sudaand
navisandagoni giromiqadrand
on ciro ki mekuned az nek jo ʙad, medonand
Alʙatta nekukoron, ki huquqi Alloh va ʙandagonro ʙaco meorand, dar ne'mat xohand ʙud
va gunohkoron, ki dar huquqi Alloh va ʙandagonas kamʙudi mekunand, dar cahannamand
Dar ruzi cazo (qijomat) ʙa cahannam darojand
Onon hecgoh az on dur namesavand
Tu ci doni, ki ʙuzurgii ruzi cazo cist
Boz ham tu ci doni, ki ʙuzurgii ruzi cazo cist
Ruzest, ki kase ʙaroi kasi digar hec kore naf' natavonad kard va dar on ruz farmon, farmoni Alloh ʙosad
Voj ʙar holi kamkunandagon
onon, ki cun az mardum ʙaroi xud xarid kardand, pajmona mesitonand, (ʙarmekasand) onro pur mekunand
va cun ʙaroi mardum cize furuxtand, mepajmojand jo ʙarmekasand, az on kam mekunand
Ojo inho namedonand, ki zinda mesavand
dar on ruzi ʙuzurg? Va muvofiqi a'molason hisoʙu kitoʙ karda mesavand
Ruze, ki mardum dar pesgohi Parvardigori cahonijon furutan meistand
Haqiqatan ʙozgasti ʙadkoron coi tang ast
Va tu ci medoni on tangi cist? Hamono on coj zindonest, ki dar on azoʙi dardovar ast
Va ʙarojason kitoʙest navistasuda! Na dar on cize afzuda mesavad va na kam karda mesavad
Dar on ruz voj ʙar holi duruƣsumorandagon
onon, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ mehisoʙand
Va on ruzro ʙa cuz har sitamgari gunahkor kase duruƣ namesumorad
Cun ojoti Mo ʙar u xonda sud, ƣuft: «Afsonahoi pesinijon ast!» Amr cunin nest, ki mepindorand, ʙalki on kalomi Alloh ast va ʙa tariqi vahj ʙa sui pajomʙaras firistoda sudaast
Cunin nest, ki megujand, ʙalki korhoe, ki karda ʙudand az gunoh ʙar dilhoson ƣoliʙ suda zang ʙastaast
Cunin nest, ki megujand, ʙegumon onon dar on ruz az didori Parvardigorason mahrum ʙosand
Pas onho ʙa cahannam darojand, harorati garmii onro mecasand
Sipas ʙa onho gufta mesavad: «In ast on ci duruƣas mesumurded!»
Ba durusti, ki nomai amalhoi nekukoron dar Illijin qaror dorad
Va tu ej Rasul ci medoni, ki Illijin cist
Kitoʙest navistasuda! Na dar on cize afzuda mesavad va na kam karda mesavad
ki faristagoni muqarraʙi Alloh dar on huzur mejoʙand
Begumon nekon dar ne'matand
ʙar taxtho nisasta va ʙa sui Parvardigorason va ʙa on ci az ne'matho ʙarojason omoda karda sudaast, nazzora mekunand
Xusi va xurramii ne'matro dar cehrahojason meʙini
Az saroʙe xolis, ki ʙar sari on muhr nihodaand, nusonida mesavand
Muhri on az musk ast. Va raƣʙatkunandagon ʙojad, ki ʙaroi hamin ne'mati doimi raƣʙat kunand
Va omezisi on saroʙ az oʙi Tasnim ast
Tasnim casmaest, ki muaqarraʙoni dargohi Alloh az on menusand va ʙa on lazzat meʙarand
Ba durusti, ki gunahkoron dar dunjo ʙa mu'minon mexandidand
Va cun ʙar onho meguzastand, masxaraomezona ʙa casmu aʙru isora mekardand
va cun ʙa ahli xonai xud ʙozmegastand, sodmon ʙozmegastand
Va cun kofiron ashoʙi Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro medidand, meguftand, ki inho gumrohand
Va hol on ki in kofiron ʙa sari mu'minon nigohʙon firistoda nasuda ʙudand
Pas ruzi qijomat mu'minon ʙa kofiron mexandand, cunon ki kofiron dar dunjo ʙa onho xandida ʙudand
ʙar taxtho takja zada va ʙa on ci az karomat va ne'mathoi cannat ʙarojason doda sudaast, menigarand
Ojo ʙa kofiron podos va sazoi korhoe, ki mekardand, doda sudaast
Cun osmon dar ruzi qijomat sikofta savad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
va hangome ki zamin ʙozkasida va pahn mesavad va kuhhoi on dar ham kuʙida savad
va har ciro ki dar darun dorad az xazinaho va murdaho ʙerun partojad va xoli gardad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
Ej inson, tu dar rohi Parvardigorat ranci farovon mekasi, ʙa'd az on ʙa Parvardigori xes dar ruzi qijomat didor meʙini, pas mukofoti amalatro ʙa fazlu adli Alloh xohi did
Har kas, ki nomaasro ʙa dasti rostas dihand, u mu'min ast
ʙa zudi az u ʙa tavri oson hisoʙ kunand
va sodmon dar cannat ʙa sui ahlas ʙozgardad
Ammo har kas, ki nomai a'molas az pusti sar doda savad, vaj kofir ast
ʙa zudi noʙudi va halokiro talaʙ kunad
Va ʙa otasi afruxta darojad
Zero u da r dunjo nazdi ahli xud sodmonu maƣrur zista ʙud
Va mepindost, ki hargiz ʙa nazdi Parvardigoras ʙaroi hisoʙ, ʙoznaxohad gast
Ore, Parvardigoras ʙa ahvoli u ʙino ʙud, az zamone, ki uro ʙijofarid, to zamone ki uro az nav zinda gardonid
Pas, Alloh megujad: ʙa surxii kanorai osmoni som savgand mexuram
va savgand ʙa saʙ va har ciro ki faro ʙigirad az corpojon va hasarot va ƣajraho
va savgand ʙa moh, cun purra savad nuri on
ki ej odamon, ʙa hole ʙa'd az holi digar xohed rasid
Ononro ci sudaast, ki ʙa Alloh va ruzi qijomat imon nameovarand
Va hangome ki Qur'on ʙar onho xonda savad, sacda namekunand
Balki kofiron haqro duruƣ mesumorand
Va Alloh ʙa on ci dar dil dorand, donotar ast
Pas ej Rasul, ononro ʙa azoʙi dardovare muƶda ʙideh
magar kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va Rasuli U imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, podosi hamesagi dorand
Alloh qasam mexurad ʙa osmon, ki doroi ʙurchost
va qasam ʙa ruzi qijomat, ki va'da dodaast, dar on xalqro cam' meovarad
va qasam ʙa guvoh va on ci ki ʙa on guvohi doda sudaast
ahli xandaqho halok sudand az ʙaroi on, ki mu'minonro azoʙ dodand
va otase afruxtand az hezumho
on goh ki ʙar kanori on otas nisasta ʙudand
va onon ʙar on ci ki ʙo mu'minon (azoʙ) mekardand, sohid ʙudand
Va az onho intiqom megiriftand, azoʙ mekardand mu'minonro, magar ʙaroi on ki ʙa Allohi ƣoliʙi loiqi sitois imon ovarda ʙudand
on Allohe, ki podsohii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va ʙar har cize guvoh ast va cize ʙar U pusida nest
Alʙatta onon, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca kardand, to ki onhoro az dini Alloh ʙozdorand, sipas tavʙa nakardand, azoʙi cahannam va azoʙi otas ʙaroi onhost
Begumon ʙaroi kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙihisthoest, ki dar on darjoho corist va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest
Alʙatta intiqom giriftani Parvardigori tu az dusmanonas saxt ast
Ust, ki naxust pajdo mekunad va pas az marg zinda mesozad
U ʙaxsojandavu dustdoranda ast, ʙaroi tavʙakunandagon
Ust sohiʙi Arsi ʙuzurg

Cehrahoi mu'minon dar on ruz xurram va toza xohand ʙud

dar ʙihiste olimaqom

Alloh ʙo ʙuzurgtarin azoʙ uro azoʙ mekunad
Alʙatta ʙozgastason ʙa'di marg ʙa sui Most

Ojo xiradmandonro in savgandho ʙasanda nest

Qavmi Iram, ki sohiʙi qomathoi ʙaland va sutunmonand ʙudand
Ki monandi on dar quvvat va ʙuzurgii casad dar hec sahre ofarida nasudaast
Va ci guna kard ʙo qavmi Samud, ki dar on vodi taxtasanghoi ʙuzurgro tarosida va az on ʙaroi xud xonaho girifta ʙudand
Va ci guna kard ʙo Fir'avn, podsohi Misr sohiʙi laskari azim, ki mulkasro ustuvor va amrasro qavi dostand
Hamon kasone, ki dar sahrho az had tacovuz kardand
va dar onho ʙisjor fasod kardand

Ej Rasul, hamono Parvardigorat dar kamingoh ast. Kasone, ki Uro nofarmoni kardand, andake muhlat medihad va ʙa'd az on onhoro ʙa azoʙi saxt giriftor mekunad
Ammo odamiro, cun Parvardigoras ʙijozmojad va giromias dorad va ne'matas dihad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro giromi dost»
Va cun ʙijozmojadas va rizqasro ʙar u tang girad, megujad: «Parvardigori man maro xor dostaast»
Na! Cunin nest, ʙalki giromi dostan ʙo to'ati Alloh ast va xori dostan ʙa nofarmonʙardorii Ust, sumo jatimro giromi namedored
va hamdigarro ʙa ta'om dodani miskin tarƣiʙ namekuned
va moli merosro harisona mexured
va molro ʙisjor dust dored
Na! Hargiz cunin nest, ki megued, cun zamin sikasta savad va pora-pora gardad
va Parvardigori tu ʙaroi hisoʙu kitoʙi xalqas ojad va faristagon saf - saf hozir savand
Va dar on ruz cahannamro hozir orand, kofir pand girad va tavʙa kunad. Va ci coi pand giriftan ʙosad
Megujad: «Ej kos, ki ʙaroi hajoti covidonai xud pesopes nekihoe mefiristodam». Va ci coi pusajmoni ast, ki dar dunjo pusajmon nasud va tavʙa nakard
Pas dar on ruzi dusvor kase cun azoʙi U azoʙ nakunad
va hec kas monandi zanciri U ʙa zancir nakasad
Gufta savad: Ej ruhi oromisjofta, ʙa zikri Alloh
xusnudu pisandida ʙa sui Parvardigorat ʙozgard
va dar zumrai ʙandagoni solehi Man doxil sav
va ʙa hamrohason ʙa ʙihisti Man daroj
(Alloh savgand jod mekunad:) Savgand ʙa in sahr (va on Makka ast)
Va sahre, ki tu sokini on hasti
Va savgand ʙa padar va farzande, ki ʙa vucud ovard, (ja'ne, ʙa padari ʙasarijat, Odam alajhissalom va farzandoni u)
Hamono, ki odamiro dar rancu mehnat ʙijofaridaem
Ojo mepindorad, ʙo on ci az mol cam' namud, ki kase ʙar u tavono nagardad
Faxr karda megujad: «Moli farovonero xarc kardam!»
Ojo mepindorad, ki kase uro nadidaast
Ojo ʙaroi u du casm najofaridaem
Va zaʙonu du laʙro najofaridaem
Va ojo ʙaroi vaj rohi neku ʙadro ʙajon nakardaem
Pas in saxsi xudsito holo ʙa guzargohi dusvor darnajomadaast
Va tu ci doni, ki guzargohi saxt cist va ʙa guzastani on ci madad merasonad
Ozod kardani ƣulomi mu'min ast

jo ʙa miskini xoknisine, (ja'ne, ʙenavoe, ki hec ciz nadorad)

Ba'd, az on ʙosad, az guruhi onhoe, ki imon ovardaand ʙa Allohu Pajomʙar va vasijat kardand jakdigarro ʙa saʙr namudan ʙar to'ati Alloh va saʙr az nofarmonihoi U va tavsija namudand jakdigarro ʙa safqatu mehruʙoni ʙa ʙandagoni Alloh
Onon, ki cunin af'olro icro namudand, inho ahli sa'odatand
Va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Mo kofir sudand, inho ʙadʙaxtonand
Nasiʙi onhost otase, ki az har su saras pusidaast
Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa oftoʙ va ravsanias ʙa hangomi cost
va savgand, ʙa moh cun az pai on ʙarojad

va savgand, ʙa saʙ, cun ruzro ʙipusad

va savgand, ʙa zamin va ʙa on ki onro pahn kard

Hamono kase, ki nafsasro pok dost, nacot joft
Hamono kase, ki nafsasro palid soxt va onro dar ma'sijat odat dod, halok sud
Qavmi Samud pajomʙarasonro az rui sarkasii xud, duruƣ ʙarovardand
On goh, ki ʙadʙaxttarinason ʙarxost va raft az ʙaroi kustani sutur
Pajomʙari Alloh Soleh alajhissalom ʙa onho guft, ki ʙa sutur kore nadosta ʙosed, hamono in mu'cizai Alloh ast va uro az navʙati oʙas ʙoz nadored
Uro duruƣ ʙarovardand va suturro kustand. Pas Parvardigorason ʙa saʙaʙi gunohason ʙar sarason azoʙ ovard va ʙo xok ʙaroʙar soxt

Ammo on kase, ki ʙaxilivu ʙeehtijoci kard

Hamon ki Pajomʙari Alloh Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro duruƣ ʙarovard va az imon ovardan ruj gardonid

kase, ki moli xudro medihad, to xestanro pokiza ʙidorad

Alʙatta oxirat ʙaroi tu ʙehtar az dunjost
Ba zudi Parvardigorat turo ej Muhammad az ne'mathoi gunogun ato xohad dod, to xusnud savi
Ojo turo qaʙl az in jatim najoft va cojat dod
Va turo rohgumkarda joft, ki namedonisti ci ast kitoʙ va ci ast imon, pas ta'lim dod turo on ciro, ki namedonisti va ʙa nekutarin amalho hidojatat kard
Va turo faqir va ʙeciz joft va ʙa qano'at va saʙr sarvatmand va dorojat gardond
Pas jatimro majozor

Ej Pajomʙar, ojo sinaatro ʙaroi tu (ʙaroi muqarraroti dini va da'vat ʙa sui Alloh va cami'i xuʙiho) nakusodem

Cun az koru ʙori dunjo foriƣ savi, ʙa iʙodat kus
va ʙa sui Parvardigorat ruj or
Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa anciru zajtun

On goh uro ʙa sui duzax gardonidem, agar az ito'ati Parvardigoras va az pajravii rasuli Alloh ruj gardonad
magar onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, pas ʙaroi onon podosi ʙepojon ast

Haqqo, ki odami az had meguzarad
har goh ki xestanro tavongar ʙinad
Haroina, ʙidonad har jak sarkas, ki ʙozgast ʙa sui Parvardigori tust. Pas har jak insonro muvofiqi amalas podosu cazo xohad dod
Ej Pajomʙar, ojo didi on kasro, ki man' mekunad
ʙandaero (Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro), ki cun ʙa namoz istad
Ojo didi ej man'kunanda, agar on mard (ja'ne Muhammad) ʙar rohi hidojat meʙud, pas ci guna uro ʙozmedost
Jo in ki ʙa taqvo va parhezgori farmon medod
Ojo didi ej Muhammad, man'kunanda agar duruƣ ʙarorad haqro va az farmon rujgardonad. Ojo az azoʙi Alloh nametarsad
Ojo magar nadonistaast, ki har ciro ki mekunad, Alloh meʙinad? Amr cunin nest, cunonki Aʙucahl mepindorad

Pesonai duruƣgui gunahgorro

Farmoni uro qaʙul makun, ki hargiz ʙa tu ʙadi natavonad rasond va sacda kunu ʙa Alloh nazdik sav
Begumon, Mo Qur'onro dar Saʙi Qadr nozil kardem! va on jake az saʙhoi mohi sarifi ramazon ast
Va tu ci medoni, ki Saʙi Qadr cist
Fazli Saʙi Qadr ʙehtar az hazor moh ast
Dar on saʙ faristagonu ruh (Caʙrail alajhissalom) ʙa icozati Parvardigorason ʙaroi ancom dodani har guna kor mefarojand
On saʙ, saʙi salomat va rahmat ast to dami suʙh
Kofironi ahli kitoʙ (az jahudu nasoro) va musrikon dast ʙarnadorand az kufri xud, to ʙarojason xuccati ravsane ʙijojad

dar onho navistahoest rostu durust, az axʙor va amrhoi odilona, ki ʙa rohi haq hidojat menamojad

Va ahli kitoʙ parokanda nasudand, magar ʙa'd az on ki ʙarojason ʙurhone ravsan omad. Va on ʙurhon Pajomʙari Alloh Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙud, ki dar Tavrotu Incil ʙarojason va'da doda suda ʙud. Hama dar pajomʙarii u ittifoq ʙudand. Pas on hangom, ki ʙa pajomʙari maʙ'us gardid, inkor kardand va parokanda sudand
Va ononro faqat in farmon dodand, ki Allohro muxlisona ʙiparastand, dar hole ki dar dini U ʙo ixlos ʙosand. Va namoz guzorandu zakot dihand. In ast dini durustu rost
Hamono az ahli kitoʙ onhoe, ki kofir sudand va musrikon, dar otasi cahannamand va dar on hamesa xohand ʙud. Inho ʙadtarini ofaridagonand
Alʙatta kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista mekunand, ʙehtarini ofaridagonand

Podosason dar nazdi Parvardigorason ʙustonhoest covidon, ki zeri on cujho meravad. Dar on co hamesa covidon ʙosand. Alloh az onho rozi ast, ki amalhojasonro qaʙul kardaast va onho az Alloh roziand, ʙa on ci ki az ne'mathojas ʙaroi onho omoda kardaast. Va in ʙaroi kasest, ki az Parvardigoras ʙitarsad va az ma'sijati U dur istad
On goh ki zamin larzonda savad ʙa saxttarin larzahojas
va zamin ʙorhoi sanginasro ʙerun rezad
va odami az tars ʙigujad, ki zaminro ci sudaast
Dar in ruz zamin xaʙarhoi xudro az neku ʙad hikojat mekunad
Zero Parvardigorat ʙa u amr kardaast, ki xaʙar ʙidihad dar rui u on ci karda sudaast
Dar on ruz mardum parokanda az qaʙrho ʙerun meojand, to amalhojasonro ʙa onho nison dihand
Pas har kas ʙa andozai zarrae neki karda ʙosad, podosi onro dar oxirat meʙinad
Va har kas ʙa andozai zarrae ʙadi karda ʙosad, azoʙasro dar oxirat meʙinad

Pas savgand ʙa aspone, ki ʙar muqoʙili dusman ʙomdodon hucum ovarand

Ba durusti, ki odami Parvardigori xudro sukr namegujad
Ba durusti, u xud ʙar in guvoh ast
Va u aloqai saxt ʙo doroi va mol dorad
Ojo insone, ki maƣrur ast namedonad Alloh ta'olo murdagonro az gurhojason ʙaroi hisoʙu cazo ʙerun meovarad
va on ci dar dilho az neku ʙad pinhon ast, oskor savad
Parvardigorason dar on ruz az holi onho va amalhojason ogoh ast. Va hec cize az U pinhon naxohad mond

Va kuhho monandi pasmi zadasuda ʙo halloci pareson karda suda xohand sud
Ammo har kasero pallai nekihoi tarozujas vaznin ʙosad
pas u dar cannat dar zindagii pisandida ʙosad
Va ammo har kasero saʙuk sud pallai nekihoi tarozujas
cojgohas dar hovijah ast
Va tu ci doni, ki hovijah cist
Otasi ʙuzurg va ʙisjor garmu suzonest
Ba ƣaflat kasid sumoro az ito'ati Alloh faxr kardan ʙa ʙisjorii molu farzand
to ʙa gurho rasided va dar on co dafn suded
Na, in tavr ne, nasojad ki molhojaton sumojonro ʙa ƣaflat andozad ʙa zudi xohed donist, ki hajoti oxirat ʙarojaton ʙehtarast
Sipas hazar kuned, ki ʙa zudi oqiʙati ʙa dunjo masƣul sudanatonro xohed donist
Na, in tavr nest, agar az rui jaqin medonisted, hatman tezi mekarded ʙar nacot dodani nafshojaton az haloki
Alʙatta, cahannamro xohed did
Sipas ʙa casmi jaqinas xohed did, ʙiduni sak
Sipas dar on ruz sumoro az tamomi ne'mathoi dunjavi ʙozxost mekunand
Alloh savgand jod mekunad, ʙa zamon
ʙa tahqiq, ki odami dar zijonkori ast
ƣajri onhoe, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand va jakdigarro ʙa haq da'vat kardaand va jakdigarro ʙa saʙr vasijat namudand
Voj (halok ʙod), ʙar holi har ajʙcui ta'nazan
on ki mole cam' kard va ʙa sumori on ʙand sud
Mepindorad, ki doroijas dar dunjo covidonaas medorad
Na cunin nest ki u fikr mekunad, u ʙegumon dar hutamah andoxta xohad sud
Va ej Rasul tu ci medoni, ki hutamah cist
Otasi afruxtai Allohast
Otase, ki ʙar dilho piruz mesavad
Begumon on otas az har su ʙar onho furu ʙasta sudaast
dar sutunhoi darozi otasi darovarda sudaast, to az on ʙerun naojand
Ej Pajomʙar, ojo nadonisti, ki Parvardigorat ʙo Ashoʙi Fil ci kard? Onhoe, ki mexostand, ki xonai Ka'ʙaro vajron kunand
Ojo makrasonro ʙotil nasoxt
Va ʙar sari onho parrandagoni guruh-guruh firistod
to onhoro ʙo siccil sangʙoron kardand
Pas, ononro cun kohi xurdasuda gardonid
Baroi unsu ulfatu amni Qurajs; ta'accuʙ kuned, ki
ulfatu amnason dar safari zimiston ʙa sui Jaman va dar toʙiston ʙa sui Som ʙud
Pas, ʙojad sukri Parvardigori in xonaro (Ka'ʙaro) ʙaco orand va Uro ʙa ixlos ʙiparastand
on Zote, ki ononro dar gurusnagi xurok dod va dar ʙimnoki amn va amon ʙaxsid
Ojo didai onro, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ mesumurd
U hamon kasest, ki jatimro ʙa xori az xud meronad
Va mardumro ʙa ta'om dodan ʙa ʙenavojon tarƣiʙ namekunad. Pas ci guna u az coniʙi xud vajro ta'om dihad
Pas voj, ʙar on namozguzoron
hamon kasone ki az namozi xud dar ƣaflatand va ʙa tamomi huquqhojas onro ʙaco nameorand va dar vaqtas ado namenamojand
Onon, ki ʙo amalhoi xuʙ rijo mekunand
va az dodani mo'un sarkasi mekunand. Pas onho na iʙodati Parvardigorasonro ʙa xuʙi ʙaco meorand va na ʙa mardum nekraftorand
Ba rosti Mo Kavsarro ʙa tu ato kardem
Pas ʙa ixlos ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va ʙa nomi U qurʙoni kun
Begumon ʙadxohi tu va ʙadxohi on ci ki tu az hidojat va nur ovardai, xud aʙtar ast
Bigu ej Rasul ʙaroi onon, ki ʙa Allohu rasulas imon najovardand: «Ej kofiron
Man cizero, ki sumo meparasted az ʙutho va ma'ʙudoni ʙotili xes, nameparastam
va sumo niz cizero, ki man meparastam az ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq, nameparasted
va man parastandai cize, ki sumo meparasted, nestam
va sumo parastandai cize, ki man meparastam, nested
Sumoro dini xud, ki ʙa on pajravi dored va maro dini xud! Ki ƣajr az vaj digar dinro talaʙ nadoram
Cun jorii Allohu piruzi ʙar kofironi Qurajs ojad
va mardumro ʙuʙini, ki guruh-guruh ʙa dini Alloh medarojand
Vaqte ki cunin sud, pas Parvardigori xudro sipos guj va az U ʙaxsois ʙixoh, ki U tavʙapazir ast
Halok ʙod dastoni Aʙulahaʙ ki u Rasululloh sallallohu alajhi va sallamro azijat medod va halok sud xudi u
Moli u va on ci ʙa dast ovarda ʙud, ʙa holas foida namekunad
Ba zudi ʙa otase su'lavare medarojad
va zani u, niz ʙa duzax medarojad, ki hezumkas ast, dar rohi Rasululloh sallallohu alajhi va sallam onro matrah mekard, to azijat kasad
Va ʙar gardan resmone az lifi (pusti) xurmo dorad. Bo on resmon dar duzax ʙardosta mesavad, ʙa'd az on ʙa pojontarini duzax partofta mesavad
Bigu ej Rasul: «Ust Allohi jakto, dar uluhijat, ruʙuʙijat va asmo va sifot va kase Uro sarik suda nametavonad
Allohe, ki ʙenijoz, sarvar, volo va ʙarovarandai umedho ast
na zoida ast va na zoida sudaast
va na hec kas hamtoi Ust!» dar xalq va af'ol va nomho va sifathojas
Bigu ej Rasul: «Ba Parvardigori suʙhgoh panoh meʙaram
az sarri on ci ʙijofaridaast
va az sarri saʙ, cun darojad va torik savad
va az sarri codugarzanhoe, ki dar girehho afsun medamand
va az sarri hasud, ki mardumonro ʙadʙinandaast va ʙar ne'mathoe, ki ʙa ʙandaas dodaast cun hasad mekunad, to ki az ʙajn ravand va ʙa azijat giriftor savand»
Bigu ej Rasul: «Ba Parvardigori mardum panoh meʙaram, ki U qodir ast dar gardonidani vasvasahoi ʙad
Podsohi mardum, ki dar tamomi holathojason ʙa onho ehtijoc nadorad
Allohi mardum, ʙa ƣajr az u hec kas ma'ʙud suda nametavonad
Az ʙadii vasvasagari pinhonsavanda, hangome ki Alloh ʙa jod ovarda savad
on ki dar dilhoi mardum vasvasa mekunad va sakku suʙhaho meandozad
xoh az cinho ʙosad jo az odamon!»
